summary: Driven to make the world better for his baby girl, John Ennis pieces together the cycle of pay-to-play politics that rules America. When insiders control the game, how can an outsider have ... See full summary Â»
cast: Jack Abramoff|Ralph Anspach|Marge Baker|Subodh Chandra|Noam Chomsky|Bob Edgar|John Ennis|Lee Fang|Kathay Feng|Brad Friedman|Paul Hackett|Thom Hartmann|Van Jones|Jason Leopold|Lawrence Lessig|Jessica Levinson|Mark Crispin Miller|John Nichols|Robert Reich|Rashad Robinson|Jerry Springer|Ciara Torres-Spelliscy|Robert Weissman|Marianne Williamson|Surya Yalamanchili
title: PAY 2 PLAY: Democracy's High Stakes
